evidence.text: ORDER granting 29 Motion to Expedite. Denka Performance Elastomer, L.L.C.'s Motion for Expedited Discovery (rec. doc. 28) is SET FOR SUBMISSION ON THE BRIEFS on Wednesday, April 19, 2026. The United States of America shall file any opposition no later than Tuesday, April 11, 2023. IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the request for oral argument on the Motion for Expedited Discovery is DENIED.
